lead_paragraph: DOMBECK--Charles. The Board of NIPD/NJ and staff will always remember Charles 'Chuck' Dombeck, our beloved Board Chair. His steadfast commitment to our organization and promotion of innovations in our field will leave a meaningful impact on people with intellectual and developmental disabilities for years to come. Our sincerest condolences to his family. 1/3
